articles.title: New Jersey limits indoor, outdoor gatherings ahead of Thanksgiving as COVID surges
articles.description: New Jersey will limit the number of people allowed to gather indoors and outdoors in an effort to bring down skyrocketing COVID-19 infections and hospitalizations, Gov. Phil Murphy (D) announced Monday.
articles.content:
New Jersey will limit the number of people allowed to gather indoors and outdoors in an effort to bring down skyrocketing COVID-19 infections and hospitalizations, Gov. Phil Murphy (D) announced Monday.
The limits on indoor gatherings will be dropped... [1771 chars]

articles.title: Philadelphia bans all indoor gatherings as COVID-19 surges across the United States
articles.description: The city of Philadelphia will ban indoor gatherings altogether and the nearby state of New Jersey will strictly limit their size as U.S. officials struggle to slow a COVID-19 surge that could overwhelm hospitals and kill thousands.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The city of Philadelphia will ban indoor gatherings altogether and the nearby state of New Jersey will strictly limit their size as U.S. officials struggle to slow a COVID-19 surge that could overwhelm hospitals and kill thousa... [3877 chars]

articles.title: Ranking the NHL's line of 'Retro Reverse' sweaters
articles.description: Every NHL team released a new jersey in one fell swoop for the first time in history. So let's rank 'em from great, to good, to Canucks.
articles.content: Never before has the NHL’s full slate of teams collaborated for a league-wide launch of fresh jersey re-designs. That means after the NHL and Adidas combined for its Retro Reverse line for official release in stores and online on Dec. 1, we have an u... [3897 chars]

articles.title: Bleachers ‘Chinatown’ With Bruce Springsteen
articles.description: Bleachers released a new single, “chinatown,” featuring Bruce Springsteen and a New Jersey–set music video. It’s the band’s first offering from a new album out in 2021, along with another new song, “45.”
articles.content: Between the legal weed and the new albums by Bruce Springsteen and Bon Jovi, Jersey pride has already reached record levels over the past few months. Expect another spike due to Bleachers’ new song, “chinatown,” the New Jerseyest thing to happen in m... [1501 chars]

articles.title: Every new NHL throwback jersey, described in one sentence
articles.description: I need this Ducks jersey right now.
articles.content: The NHL unveiled their new reverse retro jerseys on Monday morning, and for the most part they’re pretty great. Many play into the staunch traditional of organizations, others play with the nostalgia of the era in which they were created. Some are ju... [3073 chars]
